commands.description: Displays a message containing info on how to use me as well a list of all my commands. Alternatively, displays detailed information on one of my commands.
commands.extraInfo:
`help` for general information about me and how to use me, as well a list of my commands.
`help <command>`, where <command> is any one of the names of a command, for detailed information about the command

commands.description: Displays a message containing a list of all my commands.
